# get number of conspecific neighbors

getConNeigh() automatically calculates

-   species ID

-   mortality status

-   enlargens the matrix as torus

-   names the runs

-   names the generations with their generation nb. (1,2,3 -> 500,501,1000)


```{r}

# Run in parallel

# cation... this will not automatically getNames(), because it
# runs getConNeigh() on PhyloSim class. getNames() is only available for
# PhylosimList class (sequential processing)

cl <- makeCluster(length(runs)) # make cluster with core nb

# export cluster with necessary functions
clusterExport(cl, c("runs", "getConNeigh", "getCircularOffsets",
                    "getID", "getMortality"))

parallel_function <- function(run){
  result <- getConNeigh(simu = run) 
  return(result)
}

# 
runz <- parLapply(cl, X = runs, fun = parallel_function)
names(runz) <- getNames(runs)
saveRDS(runz, paste0(root, "local/runs/mstr/20250715_validation/20250715_MstrRunConN.rds"))
```
